title.rendered: Bruce Springsteen on the Passing of Joe DePugh

content.rendered:
Just a moment to mark the passing of Freehold native and ballplayer Joe DePugh. He was a good friend when I needed one. “He could throw that speedball by you, make you look like a fool”….Glory Days my friend.

Bruce Springsteen

excerpt.rendered: Just a moment to mark the passing of Freehold native and ballplayer Joe DePugh. He was a good friend when I needed one. “He could throw that speedball by you, make you look like a fool”….Glory Days my friend. Bruce Springsteen
